features: [INTEL POWERED MULTI-TASKING] - Built with a 4th Generation Quad-Core Intel i5 and 16GB of DDR3 RAM; Energy efficient processor, Quality multitasking, media streaming and smooth, multi-tab web browsing; Perfect as an all-purpose home or office computer, remote learning, work from home computer or HTPC streaming media center.

body.description: Dell Optiplex 7020 Desktop Computer: Designed for High-Quality Multi-taskingPerfect Home or Office PC: Built for professional grade multitasking, high-speed web browsing, and multimedia applications like streaming, or even lightweight editing.Compatible with Todays Most Popular Productivity Tools!This professional grade multitasking computer is compatible with all of todays most popular productivity software, like Office 365, Adobe, Docs, Sheets, Intuit Quickbooks, Netsuite, Audacity, Basecamp, Zoom, Cisco, Teams, and much more!This Home / Office Computer Hardware Includes:CPU: Intel Quad-Core i5-4590iGPU: Intel HD 4600RAM: 16GB DDR3Primary Storage: 250GB Solid State Drive (SSD) Network: Standard RJ-45 LAN PortWireless: Wi-Fi 5G + BluetoothBUY and OWN WITH CONFIDENCE Renewed and modernized by the #1 Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher, this Dell 7020 Desktop Computer is guaranteed to perform like-new and comes with a money-back guarantee!MICROSOFT AUTHORIZED REFURBISHED Your Desktop comes with a digitally rendered Windows 10 Professional install for a secure and convenient setup process. Every computer from us is professionally renewed through a set of globally recognized and top-tier production processes, including a full-system test, a fresh install of Windows 10 Professional, and robust stress-testing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great as promised
reviews.reviewText: great machine, fast and ready to use, literally plug and play

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far I've been really happy with this computer. It has performed well and was easy to set up. We've had a little bit of an issue with the Bluetooth not working, but the customer support has been very responsive and helpful. Aaron was especially helpful when talking us through troubleshooting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Basic Computer
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying refurbished computers for years. This computer was a good value with all the basic qualities my wife requires. Cosmetically it was like new except one very minor blemish on the case. The model number Dell which I received was a 9020 rather than the 7020 as the picture suggests. The 9020 model has only 1 open slot, since one slot is used for the WIFI board. That limitation did not matter to me, but might matter to anyone needing more open slots. Overall setup was very easy. When I ran into a minor problem. Steven at tech support was very helpful. After Steven's help, I was able to have the computer up and running in less than 10 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked right off the bat.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second refurbished computer from Amazon and works great. 💪

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: WiFi on it does not work, constantly goes out. Had to use an Ethernet cable but all else is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and service.
reviews.reviewText: I was very surprised when I received this computer. It even had an installed wifi card, not a usb wifi. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was in doubt purchasing the computers, great memory and very cheap. When I got it was really easy to transfer all the information. Recommended A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars They install extra cards to replace dead board components
reviews.reviewText: Network card on the motherboard is dead, so they installed a third party card, using the slot for network that I intend to use for a graphics card. Will NEVER buy from them again. This is ridiculous. Slap a bunch of crap parts together and sell em! Now I have 3x as much work to do to get these PCs ready. I have no words for how upset I am right now.Update: 2 of 3 were like this, one had a wifi card installed, one an ethernet card to replace the dead one on the motherboard. Also missing the hardware jumper so gave an error on boot that it was completely missing. Good thing I have some spare parts laying around and managed to find one. Maybe I should start cobbling these parts together into "complete" working machines instead of trying to buy them. Wow is all I can say.
